messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: I will derive this data from the following paragraph: CASE NAME: The Riddling Riverside Riddle DATE: 12/12/83 The courtroom was a scene of rigorous inquiry as the trial unfolded. The prosecution introduced the officers key to the investigation to expound on their discoveries. LAW ENFORCEMENT TESTIMONY: PROSECUTOR: Please state your name and role in the investigation. WITNESS: I am Captain A. B. Clark, the lead investigator in this case. PROSECUTOR: Thank you, Captain Clark. Can you recount the events on the day the riddle was discovered? WITNESS: Absolutely. On the day of April 4th, Officer C. D. Davis came across a puzzling scenario by the riverside and reported it. The investigation ensued swiftly. PROSECUTOR: Who managed the forensic examination? WITNESS: Sergeant E. F. Foster and Technician G. H. Hill conducted the forensic analysis. PROSECUTOR: Who spearheaded the interrogations? WITNESS: Detectives I. J. Jackson and K. L. King undertook the interrogations of suspects and potential witnesses. PROSECUTOR: Thank you. No further questions. The Defense initiated a meticulous cross-examination of Captain Clark concerning the investigative techniques. Throughout the trial, Patrol Officer M. N. Nelson, Patrol Officer O. P. Phillips, and Patrol Officer Q. R. Roberts were also summoned to testify.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.
